question: Is it permissible to wear a pendant that has Allah written on it? Is it okay not to remove it when we go to the washroom. If I do not remove it then is it a sin.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
It is not permissible for a man to wear a necklace or a pendant. It will have to be removed before entering the toilet. (Shaami vol.4 pg.359; vol.1 pg.176)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
